segments.text: Mary , could you please come in for a short while ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mary , I'd like you to meet Richard , Our new executive in the marketing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Welcome to our department . I hope you'll like it here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: By the way , Richard will assist me in the planning work . I hope you can work well together .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , if you've got any problem you can ask me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you.It ' s very kind of you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Richard , Mary is a very helpful and experienced secretary indeed , and I'm sure you will find out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , sir . I'll try my best to assist Richard in his work .
segments.speaker: S2
